name: Dunge-O-Plunge
short_description:
A snarky, top-down 2D management/city-builder game about building, running and managing a dungeon to maim and exploit courageous heroes. Built on top of the LÖVE game engine, which is multiplatform.

Right now, Dunge-O-Plunge is in a closed pre-alpha state. The source code is available as per the terms of the GPL but the program should be considered unreleased. Thank you for your interest in the project!
summary: A snarky 2D management game about building and running a dungeon.

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop
